message.content:
The task requires identifying the line item and value that represent the addition in the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit during the period. This typically corresponds to the "Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable" in the cash flow statement.

From the provided cash flow statement:

| Account                             | Amount      | Date       |
|-----------------------------------|-------------|------------|
| Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable  | 6600000.00 | 2024-02-05 |

This line shows an increase of 6,600,000.00 in accounts payable, which means the entity owes more for goods or services purchased on credit.

Hence, the value to extract is "6600000.00".

```json
{"solution": {"value": "6600000.00"}}
```
